Keywords: Armor , Cabal , Latveria , Mystical , Politician , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
(+5) WHY DO ALL YOUR ROBOTS LOOK LIKE YOU AGAIN?: When placing characters during game setup, place Dr. Doom on this card and generate two [F4] 005 Doombots in your starting area. // This game, when a friendly 005 Doombot is KO'd, you may immediately place Dr. Doom from this card into their square, and must do so if no other friendly [F4] 005 Doombot is on the map. // While Dr. Doom is on this card, [F4] 005 Doombots can use Leadership.
MY ROBOTS OFTEN CONFUSE MY FOES: Leadership, Mastermind. When Dr. Doom uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may generate a [F4] 005 Doombot.
Trade Dr. Doom Want Dr. Doom

@muel0017 Rule question, rules forum etc. but tom the point: No (they generated so they come outside of the game) also Yes (they have a point value so points are scored).
April 29, 2021
muel0017
For his trait: "(+5) WHY DO ALL YOUR ROBOTS LOOK LIKE YOU AGAIN?: When placing characters during game setup, place Dr. Doom on this card and generate two [F4] 005 Doombots in your starting area." Do you pay the points for the first 2 Doombots? My first thought is no, because you generate them, they are not a part of your starting force. Am I correct? ALSO When you KO those Doombots, do you score their point value?
February 19, 2021
Goop
i dont like the +5 ability at all. 2 extra bots and he comes in later. Meh, i'd rather start rolling for leadership ASAP and try and get as many doombots in play as i can. He seems much stronger that way. You can even keep him in the back and force your opponents to come to you. How good he is really depends on how your rolls go. You get a bunch of doombots out and enhancement them its a lot of pain for your opponent.
February 2, 2021
Superboy Prime
Dare I say it? The best Dr. Doom in the game. I like playing him with Darkseid in a nice 300 point "Ruler" theme team. We decimated Prime Apocalypse who used Trelane as his Pestilence Horseman. While the dice antics were irritating, Darksied pounded on Apocalypse and when Doom showed up after both Doombots were KO'ed, it was basically a wrap. Fun, fun, fun! F#%K off new rules, we play the classics in my town! 2002-2020 rules forever!
September 13, 2020
KillerKing
Just played him in a 400 points match, both themed teams, mine was Latveria, my opponent's was Cosmic. This guy alone at 100 (with the Doombots he generated) took down both 100 points God Emperor Doom and 95 points Captain Marvel. MVP of the game for sure, WOW, just WOW. Only gripe I have, he should have flight, and maybe 1 more range.

September 5, 2020
WelcomeToDIE
My only gripe with this guy, is that he doesn't have open hands on the sculpt to pay homage to the original Doom and Doombots from Cobbering Time, wherein the Doombots had clenched fists and Doom himself had an open fist on their sculpts. Other than that, this is a very fun and very functional Doom for 95/45 or 100/50 depending on whether you use his trait. He's not the definitive Doom that the Cosmic Clash one is, but I prefer him at 100 over that one's 100 point line, and the Doombot generation/switcheroo is a jolly good time. RICHARDS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
